sentence: The Relative Strength ( RS ) Rating for Talend ( TLND ) entered a new percentile Friday, with a rise from 80 to 83.
[ibd-display-video id=2385970 width=50 float=left autostart=true] This exclusive rating from Investor's Business Daily tracks share price movement with a 1 (worst) to 99 (best) score.
The rating shows how a stock's price performance over the trailing 52 weeks compares to all the other stocks in our database.
Over 100 years of market history shows that the best stocks typically have an RS Rating north of 80 as they begin their biggest climbs.
